Class Room

java.lang.Object
Room
public class Room extends Object
Class Room - Represents a location in the game. A Room is a specific location in the game's map. Each room has a description and can be connected to other rooms in various directions.
Author:
Florian NELCHA

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Room(String pD, String pI)
    Constructor to initialize the room with a description, an image, and two HashMaps with its exits and Items.

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(String pD, String pI)
      Constructor to initialize the room with a description, an image, and two HashMaps with its exits and Items.
      Parameters:
      pD - Description of the room.
      pI - Location of the room's image.

  • Method Details

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Gets the description of the room.
      Returns:
      Description of the room.

    • getExit

      public Room getExit(String pDirection)
      Gets the room in the specified direction if it exists.
      Parameters:
      pDirection - The direction in which to look for an exit.
      Returns:
      The neighboring room in the specified direction, or null if it doesn't exist.

    • getExitString

      public String getExitString()
      Creates a keySet of all the exits from the current room, then constructs a string of it.
      Returns:
      A string with all available exit directions.

    • getLongDescription

      public String getLongDescription()
      Returns a description of the current room, of the form : You are in the Control Room. Exits : south
      Returns:
      A description of the room, and its exits

    • getImageName

      public String getImageName()
      Returns the name of the Room's image.
      Returns:
      The name of the Room's image.

    • getItem

      public Item getItem(String pName)
      Returns the item having the specified name.
      Parameters:
      pName - The name of the item we look for.
      Returns:
      The item having the specified name.

    • getItemString

      public String getItemString()
      Creates a keySet of all the Items in the current room, then constructs a string of it.
      Returns:
      A string with all available Items.

    • updateDescription

      public void updateDescription(String pNewD)
      Sets a new description for the room.
      Parameters:
      pNewD - New description to set.

    • setExits

      public void setExits(String pDirection, Room pNeighbor)
      Sets an exit for the specified direction to a neighboring room.
      Parameters:
      pDirection - Direction of the exit.
      pNeighbor - The neighboring room in that direction.

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Item pItem)
      Adds an Item in the room
      Parameters:
      pItem - Item to add in the room.

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(String pItemName)
      Remove the specified Item from the room
      Parameters:
      pItemName - Name of the Item to remove from the room.

    • isExit

      public boolean isExit(Room pRoom)
      Checks if the given room is one of the exits of this room.
      Parameters:
      pRoom - The room to check.
      Returns:
      True if the room is an exit, false otherwise.
